short_summary: Purchase of an automated capillary electrophoresis instrument for the Department of the Environment.
description: The Department of the Environment requires the purchase of an automated capillary electrophoresis (CE) instrument. The equipment must be delivered and installed to Pacific Environmental Science Centre located in North Vancouver by March 31, 2023. This is a reserved request for holders of Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PV-19EQUI.
duration_in_months: If filled in 2023 this projects is to last till march 2024 that is 13 month hence in the year of the posts to ACL the project will still have many months till it expried.
full_summary:
# Automated Capillary Electrophoresis Instrument

### Summary
The Department of the Environment (ECCC) seeks to purchase an automated capillary electrophoresis (CE) instrument, which must be delivered and installed at the Pacific Environmental Science Centre in North Vancouver by March 31, 2023. This requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and bilateral agreements with Chile, Colombia, Honduras, and Korea.

### Solicitation Details
* **Bid Number:** E60PV-19EQUI/C
* **Solicitation Issue Date:** January 6, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 15, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Estimate in Your Time Zone)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 30, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia

### Key Information
* This procurement is reserved for suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PV-19EQUI for the purchase of laboratory and scientific equipment, parts, and accessories, services, and supplies.
* Interested suppliers should have already been invited to bid.
* Suppliers may qualify for the SA at any time.

### ITT Documents
* [0Tender Documents] (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15066402?extsite=MTUwNjY0MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contact Information
* **Name:** Thomas Leboeuf
* **Email:** [thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:thomas.leboeuf@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** None
* **Fax:** None

## Contracting Entity Information
**Department of the Environment (ECCC)**
**Pacific Environmental Science Centre**
